description.value: You make a claw Strike against a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or otherwise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] by you. If you hit, you deal damage as usual and that creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].
